Articles.Content: I have a contract to "test" landing gear in flight. I can click on the gear in the hangar but when I am on the runway or flying I can't click on them. It is like they don't exist so I can't click and select "test" to complete the contract. I can raise and lower the gear and the brakes work too.
The spot you have to click for them is a little off. Mouse over them when you're on the runway until it light up green, you'll know you're over it.

I sat on the runway and moused over them from many angles. They don't light up green like the do in the hangar. It is simple in the hangar but they don't seem to exist outside the hangar.
Could you post a .craft file of your plane? It will allow us to troubleshoot with you. I wonder if the lander gear is clipped too far in.
Yeah, post the craft file. I'll have a look-see.
